channel.title: My Website works local, but has a little problem online
channel.description:
Hey, Just finished up my website, works fine when i test it on local, by just clicking on the html files.
but after uploading it to my webhost, the whole webclient.html is gone, and my banner.
so i thought hmm it might be my host, so i made a quik 000webhost acc to test it, and there it was the same problem...
anybody has a clue??

item.title: My Website works local, but has a little problem online
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Jacob_:

Did you add the css & image files to the host as well?

^

And yeah, did you copy all the required files?

Read full topic
